content: अशिव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Inauspicious, causing or threatening mischief; अशिवा दिशि दीप्तायां शिवास्तत्र भयावहाः (रुरुवुः) <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Unlucky, unfortunate. {@--3@} Unkind, unfriendly, envious. {@--4@} Pernicious, dangerous. --वः <ab>N.</ab> of a certain divine being. --वा A female demon or goblin. --वं {@--1@} Ill-luck, misfortune. {@--2@} Mischief.
